message.name: GAS_SENSOR_RAW
message.description: This message contains ADC outputs of 4 gas sensors.
message.field: The raw data from the ADC channel 1.
The raw data from the ADC channel 2.
The raw data from the ADC channel 3.
The raw data from the ADC channel 4.

message.name: GAS_SENSOR
message.description: This message contains scaled values of gas sensors to the described units.
message.field: The scaled values to the described units from ADC channel 1.
The scaled values to the described units from ADC channel 2.
The scaled values to the described units from ADC channel 3.
The scaled values to the described units from ADC channel 4.
